content: धारण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [धृ-णिच्-ल्युट्] Holding, bearing, carrying, preserving, sustaining, protecting, having, assuming, &c. --णौ (<ab>du.</ab>) The two female breasts. --णं {@--1@} The act of holding, bearing, supporting, preserving or keeping back. {@--2@} Possessing, possession. {@--3@} Observing; holding fast. {@--4@} Retaining in the memory; ग्रहणधारणपटुर्बालकः. {@--5@} Being indebted (to any one.) {@--6@} Steady abstraction of the mind. {@--7@} Keeping, maintaining. {@--8@} Restraining. {@--9@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) Pronouncing imperfectly, --णी {@--1@} A row or line. {@--2@} A vein or tubular vessel. {@--3@} Steadiness.
